text: Creatures of the Night is a studio album by the American hard rock/heavy metal band Kiss. It was released on October 13, 1982. == Track listing == *Creatures of the Night *Saint and Sinner *Keep Me Comin' *Rock and Roll Hell *Danger *I Love It Loud *I Still Love You *Killer *War Machine Category:Kiss (band) albums Category:1982 albums Category:Heavy metal albums
title: Creatures of the Night
